                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 1</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>ল্যাবরেটরিতে প্রধানত কোন ধরনের গ্লাভস ব্যবহার করা হয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>নাইট্রাইল রাবার গ্লাভস</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ল্যাটেক্স গ্লাভস</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ভিনাইল হ্যান্ড গ্লাভস</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>জিটেক্স গ্লাভস</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ল্যাটেক্স গ্লাভস-বৈদ্যুতিক শক প্রতিরোধ; ভিনাইল গ্লাভস- মৃদু ক্ষয়কারী পদার্থ প্রতিরোধ; জিটেক্স গ্লাভস- তাপ রোধক।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-০৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 3</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>5 mg রাইডার ব্যবহার করলে রাইডার ধ্রুবক কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>0.001 g</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>0.0001 g</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>0.0002 mg</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>0.0002 g</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>5 mg রাইডার ব্যবহার করলে রাইডার ধ্রুবক <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-3-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.0001</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-20" style="width: 14.92em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.215em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1012.22em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-21"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-22" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-23" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-24" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-25" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-26" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-27" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-28" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-29" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-30" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-31" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-32" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-33" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-34" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-35" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-36" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-37" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.0001</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-38" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-39" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.0001</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-3">\rm =5\ mg\times\frac{2}{100}=0.1\ mg=0.0001\ g</script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-১১]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-10-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-95" style="width: 4.01em;                                                 <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 8</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>ডেসিমোলার দ্রবণ বলতে কী বোঝায়?</p>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ডেসিমোলার: 0.1 M; সেন্টিমোলার: 0.01 M; সেমিমোলার: 0.5 M<br>

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>4</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.005</mn></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৪৮৪]</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[কবীর স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-১৬৭]</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 13</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোন মৌলের ইলেকট্রন বিন্যাসে সাধারণ নিয়মের ব্যতিক্রম ঘটে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ভারী ধাতুর আয়ন: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-31-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-333" style="width: 10.125em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.281em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1008.28em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-334"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-335" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-336"><span style="display: inline-block; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-362"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-363"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-364" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-365" style="font-size: 70.7%; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-31">\rm Pb^{2+}, Hg^{2+}, Cd^{2+}, Cr^{3+}</script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৪৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 16</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>ইলেকট্রন আবিষ্কার করেন কে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>রাদারফোর্ড</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

</label>

</label>

                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

</label>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: রাদারফোর্ড- প্রথম পরমাণু মডেল; বোর- ইলেকট্রনের শক্তিস্তরের ধারণা; স্রোডিঞ্জার- ত্রিমাত্রিক তরঙ্গ বলবিদ্যার সমীকরণ।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ- ২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-১০৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: H এর নিউক্লিয়াসের ব্যাস <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-40-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x223C;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>13</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-488" style="width: 7.584em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.191em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1006.19em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-489"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-490"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-491"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-492"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-493" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-494"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-495"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-496" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-497" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">12</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-498" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∼</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-499" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-500"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-501"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-502" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-503"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-504"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-505" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-506" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">13</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-507" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-508" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-509" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn></mrow></msup><mo>∼</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>13</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-40">\rm {10}^{-12}\sim  {10}^{-13}\ cm</script></span>;<br>
H এর পরমাণুর আকার <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-41-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-510" style="width: 3.527em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.871em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1002.87em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-511"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-512"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-513"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-514"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-515" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-516"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-517"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-518" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-519" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-520" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-521" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-522" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-41">\rm {10}^{-8}\ cm</script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ- ২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৮৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 19</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 20</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>বর্ণালির সূক্ষ্মরেখায় বিভক্ত হওয়ার কারণ ব্যাখ্যা করে নিচের কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>n</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>l</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>m</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>s</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: n = শক্তিস্তরের আকার জানা; l = বর্ণালিতে সূক্ষ্ম রেখার উৎপত্তি বোঝা; s = &nbsp;ইলেকট্রনের চুম্বক ধর্ম ব্যাখ্যা।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ- ২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা- ১০৭]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 21</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>অরবিটের সর্বাধিক ইলেকট্রন ধারণক্ষমতা কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-47-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-579" style="width: 0.685em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.549em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.642em, 1000.55em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-580"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-581" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.669em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-47">\rm n</script></span></p>

padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-629" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0.01</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-630" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-631" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>0.01</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-54">\rm 10nm-0.01nm</script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ- ২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-১৩৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 24</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের ৪টি কোয়ান্টাম সংখ্যার মানের কোন সেটটি অবাস্তব?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-59-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-681" style="width: 2.42em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1001.93em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-682"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-683" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-684" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-685" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-59">\rm  n=3</script></span> হলে, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-60-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-686" style="width: 4.018em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.281em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.24em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-687"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-688" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-689" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-690" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-691" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-692" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-693" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-694" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-60">\rm l=0,1,2</script></span>;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-61-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-695" style="width: 8.035em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.559em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1006.52em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-696"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-697" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-698" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-699" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-700" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-701" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-702" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-703" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-704" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-705" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-62-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-710" style="width: 3.281em;                                             </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-66-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></mrow></msub><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></mrow></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-754" style="width: 5.239em;                                                 <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-68-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></mrow></msub><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></mrow></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-779" style="width: 5.617em;                                     <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 28</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-70-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x3B1;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-811" style="width: 0.784em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.635em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.678em, 1000.6em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-812"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-813"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-814"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-815" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.639em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>α</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-70">α</script></span>&nbsp;কণা বিচ্ছুরণ পরীক্ষা দ্বারা কোনটি আবিষ্কৃত হয়েছে?</p>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 29</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>বোর মডেল নিচের কোন আয়নের বর্ণালি ব্যাখা করতে পারে?</p>

                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-71-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-816" style="width: 1.687em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.368em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.277em, 1001.37em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-817"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-818"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.368em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.73em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-819" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.731em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-820" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.058em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-71">\rm H^+ </script></span></p>
</label>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-72-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-821" style="width: 2.234em;                                                 <span class="fas fa-check"></span>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-74-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-833" style="width: 2.37em;                                 </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: বোর মডেল H পরমাণু ও একক <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-75-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-839" style="width: 1.068em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1000.86em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-840"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-841"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-842" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-843" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>−</mo></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-75">\rm e^-</script></span> বিশিষ্ট আয়নগুলোর <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-76-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-844" style="width: 5.207em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.264em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1004.18em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-845"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-846" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-847" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-848"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-849" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-850" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-851" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-852" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-853" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-854"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-855" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-856"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-857"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-858" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-859" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-860" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-76">\rm (He^+,\ Li^{2+})</script></span> বর্ণালির ব্যাখ্যা করতে পারে।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৮৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 30</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>H পরমাণুর প্রথম কক্ষপথের বেগ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-77-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-861" style="width: 1.455em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1001.19em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-862"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-863"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.75em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-864" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.747em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-865" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.225em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.093em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-77">\rm V_1</script></span> হলে ২য় কক্ষপথের বেগ কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-80-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-880" style="width: 2.051em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-82-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi></mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-894" style="width: 4.879em;                                         <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোন জোড়া পরস্পর আইসোবার?</p>

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-84-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msubsup><mi></mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>6</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>14</mn></mrow></msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-919" style="width: 1.869em; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.442em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.503em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msubsup><mi></mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>8</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>16</mn></mrow></msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-90">\rm _{\ \ 8}^{16}O</script></span>&nbsp;ও&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-91-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msubsup><mi></mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>7</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>14</mn></mrow></msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1010" style="width: 1.915em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.551em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.277em, 1001.5em, 2.689em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1011"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1012"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.776em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.873em, 1000em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1013"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.372em, 1000.78em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.369em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1014"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1015"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1016" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">14</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.78em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1017"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1018"><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1019" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1020" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1021" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1022" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.442em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.503em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msubsup><mi></mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>7</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>14</mn></mrow></msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-91">\rm _{\ \ 7}^{14}N</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: আইসোবার = প্রোটন সংখ্যা অসমান কিন্তু ভর সংখ্যা সমান।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-১০৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-97-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>27</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>4</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1062" style="width: 2.234em;                                             <p>কোবাল্ট ব্লু-গ্লাসে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-98-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1068" style="width: 2.684em;                                             <p>কোন দ্রবণ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-100-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1086" style="width: 2.796em;                         <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 39</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>ইউক্যালিকটাস পাতা থেকে এর তৈল নিষ্কাশনে কোন পদ্ধতি ব্যবহৃত হয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আংশিক পাতন</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বাষ্প পাতন</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>নিম্নচাপ পাতন</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ঊর্ধ্বপাতন</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: আংশিক পাতন: ডিজেল, পেট্রোল পৃথকীকরণ, রেকটিফাইড স্পিরিট উৎপাদন;&nbsp;<br>
নিম্নচাপ পাতন: সাবান শিল্পে;&nbsp;<br>
ঊর্ধ্বপাতন: উদ্বায়ী কঠিন পদার্থের ভেজাল পৃথকীকরণ।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-২১০]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 42</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

top: -3.687em; left: 2.722em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1154" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1155" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.469em; left: 4.808em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1156"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1157"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1158" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1159" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                                         <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-২৮৬]</p>

                            <div class="row question">

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 43</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পারমাণবিক ব্যাসার্ধের ক্ষেত্রে নিচের কোন ক্রমটি সঠিক?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
