                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-114-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1215" style="width: 10.385em;                                         <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: Na এর পারমাণবিক ব্যাসার্ধ 186 pm<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-২৯৬]</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-116-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2.0</mn><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3.0</mn><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3.5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1241" style="width: 11.068em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.059em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1009.02em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1242"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1243" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1244" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1245" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2.0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1246" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1247" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">N</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1248" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1249" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3.0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1250" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1251" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">O</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1252" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1253" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3.5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2.0</mn><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3.0</mn><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3.5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-116">\rm B = 2.0; N = 3.0; O = 3.5</script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৩০৬]</p>
</span>

                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 48</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোনটি উভধর্মী অক্সাইড নয়?</p>

                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-117-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1254" style="width: 3.281em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: উভধর্মী অক্সাইড- <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-121-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1282" style="width: 14.018em; [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৩১৪]</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 49</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-122-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1315" style="width: 3.132em;                                     <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-123-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1323" style="width: 1.928em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: আয়ন ডাইপোল আকর্ষণ বল- <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-134-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>50</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1432" style="width: 7.379em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.027em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1005.95em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1433"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1434" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1435" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1436" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">50</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1437" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1438" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1439" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1440" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1441" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1442"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1443" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1444"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1445"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1446" style="font-size: 70.7%; </script></span>; ডাইপোল আবিষ্ট ডাইপোল আকর্ষণ বল- <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-135-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1449" style="width: 6.6em; [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৩৫১]</p>
</span>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 52</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>বরফে প্রতি <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-136-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1465" style="width: 2.424em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.977em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1001.9em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1466"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1467"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.71em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1468" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.747em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1469" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block;                             <div class="row question">

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>মাতৃদুগ্ধের pH মান কত?</p>

                                        </div>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 67</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>এসিডের তীব্রতার ক্ষেত্রে নিচের কোন ক্রমটি সঠিক?</p>

                                    </div>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৭৪]</p>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 70</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিম্নের কোন বিক্রিয়ার সাম্যাবস্থার উপর চাপের প্রভাব নেই?</p>

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-169-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>5</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21CC;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1760" style="width: 15.075em; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.868em; left: 0.276em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1766" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1767" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1768" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1769" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1770" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">⇌</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1771" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">P</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1772" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1773"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.868em; left: 0.276em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1775" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1776" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1777" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1778" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1779" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1780" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1781"><span style="display: inline-block;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৪০]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 71</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>মানব দেহের রক্তে কোন বাফারটি pH নিয়ন্ত্রণ করে না?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ফসফেট বাফার</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বাইকার্বনেট বাফার</p>
</label>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>বিশুদ্ধ পানিতে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-175-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1882" style="width: 2.647em;                                             <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-176-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>6</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1889" style="width: 5.285em;                                                 <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-183-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1974" style="width: 2.416em;                                             </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: লেড প্রকোষ্ঠ পদ্ধতিতে NO প্রভাবক হিসেবে ব্যবহৃত হয়।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৪২৮]</p>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 78</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোনটির ক্ষেত্রে অসওয়াল্ডের সূত্র প্রযোজ্য?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-189-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2034" style="width: 3.554em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: মৃদু ক্ষার ও মৃদু অম্লের জন্য অসওয়াল্ডের সূত্র প্রযোজ্য।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৬৯, ৪৭০]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 79</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>অম্লধর্মী মাটির pH বাড়াতে কোনটি ব্যবহৃত হয় না?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-200-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2125" style="width: 4.01em;                                             </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: এ লবণ <i>Clostridium Botulinum</i> এর কোষ মেমব্রেন ফাটিয়ে দেয় : <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: গুঁড়া দুধে ইমালসিফায়ার হিসেবে E322 বা লেসিথিন ব্যবহৃত হয়।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৫৬৮]</p>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 98</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>টেলকম পাউডারে আয়তন বৃদ্ধিকারক হিসেবে ব্যবহৃত হয় নিচের কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>Mg স্টিয়ারেট</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-208-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2207" style="width: 3.827em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.144em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1003.14em, 2.552em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2208"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2209" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2210" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2211" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2212"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.186em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.73em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2213" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.868em; left: 0.776em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2214" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-208">\rm CaCO_3&nbsp;</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বোরিক এসিড</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>টেলক</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো:&nbsp;টেলকম পাউডারের আয়তন বৃদ্ধিকারক হিসেবে ব্যবহৃত হয় <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৬০০]</p>

                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোন গ্লাভস বৈদ্যুতিক শক প্রতিরোধক?</p>

                                </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ল্যাটেক্স-রাবার গ্লাভস ব্যবহারে বৈদ্যুতিক শক বা ত্বকে ক্ষত সৃষ্টি থেকে রক্ষা পাওয়া যায়।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-০৩]</p>
</span>

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-2-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-11" style="width: 4.784em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.918em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1003.92em, 2.552em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-12"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-13" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-14" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-15" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-16" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-17"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.186em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.73em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-18" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.868em; left: 0.776em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-19" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-2">\rm NaHCO_3</script></span>&nbsp;দ্রবণ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ল্যাবরেটরিতে ব্যবহৃত ক্রোমিক এসিড মিশ্রণ হল <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-3-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>7</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-20" style="width: 3.977em; [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-০৭]</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 103</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>10 mg রাইডার ব্যবহার করলে রাইডার ধ্রুবক কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: 10 mg রাইডার ব্যবহার করলে রাইডার ধ্রুবক <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>&amp;#xD7;</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.0002</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-41" style="width: 15.412em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.625em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1012.62em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-42"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-43" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-44" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">10</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-45" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-46" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-47" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-48" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-49" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-50" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-51" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-52" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-53" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-54" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-55" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-56" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-57" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-58" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.0002</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-59" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-60" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.0002</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-5">\rm =10 \ mg×\frac 2{100}=0.2 \ mg=0.0002 \ g</script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-১১]</p>
</span>

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-82" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>0.01</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-8">\rm 0.01 \ m^3 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-9-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-83" style="width: 3.964em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.235em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.277em, 1003.24em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-84"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-85" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-86" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-87" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-88"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.277em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.82em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-89" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-90" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>0.1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-9">\rm 0.1 \ cm^3</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ব্যুরেট সাধারণত&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-10-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>50</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-91" style="width: 2.953em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.42em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1002.42em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-92"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-93" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">50</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-94" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-95" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-96"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-97" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-98" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>50</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-10">\rm 50\ cm^3 </script></span> আয়তনের হয় এবং 50&nbsp;ভাগে ভাগ করা থাকে। প্রতিটি ভাগ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-11-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-99" style="width: 2.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.01em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1002.01em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-100"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-101" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-102" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-103" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-104"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-105" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-106" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-11">\rm 1\ cm^3</script></span> হয়। পরবর্তীতে এই ভাগকে 10 ভাগে ভাগ করলে ক্ষুদ্রতম আয়তন হয় <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-107" style="width: 3.281em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.666em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1002.67em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-108"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-109" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-110" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-111" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-112"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-113" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-114" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>0.1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-12">\rm 0.1 \ cm^3</script></span>।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-২৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: টাইট্রেশন কাজে ব্যবহৃত হওয়ায় কনিকেল ফ্লাস্ককে টাইট্রেশন ফ্লাস্কও বলা হয়।<br>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-115" style="width: 5.421em; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>

                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-14-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>.</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-125" style="width: 6.833em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

তরল শুষ্ককারক- <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>.</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-193" style="width: 5.617em; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.05</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-258" style="width: 7.528em;                                         <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-27-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mn>0.05</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-271" style="width: 10.617em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.691em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1008.61em, 2.338em, -999.998em); <p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৪৮৪]&nbsp;</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[কবীর স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-১৬৭]</p>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 113</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: H- পরমাণুর প্রথম কক্ষপথের ব্যাসার্ধকে বোর ব্যাসার্ধ বলে।&nbsp;<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ- ২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা- ৮৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-474" style="width: 1.232em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.004em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1001em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-475"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-476"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.004em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.55em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-477" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.549em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-478" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.114em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-52">\rm n^2 </script></span></p>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 124</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের ৪টি কোয়ান্টাম সংখ্যার মানের কোন সেটটি অবাস্তব?</p>

                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 130</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>H&nbsp;পরমাণুর প্রথম কক্ষপথের শক্তি <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-64-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-645" style="width: 1.38em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.12em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1001.12em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-646"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-647"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.12em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.63em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-648" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.673em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-649" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.225em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.093em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-64">\rm E_1</script></span> হলে ৩য় কক্ষপথের শক্তি কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
