                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-69-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mn>9</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-676" style="width: 8.404em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.887em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1006.89em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-677"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-678"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-679" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-680" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-681" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-682" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-683" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-684" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-685" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-686" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-687" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-688"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-689" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.219em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-690" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-691" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-692" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.78em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-693"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-694" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-695" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-696" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.9em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mn>9</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-69">\rm E_n=E_1\times\frac{1}{n^2}=\frac{E_1}{9}</script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৯৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 131</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>IUPAC কর্তৃক গৃহীত পারমাণবিক ভর প্রকাশের স্কেল কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অক্সিজেন স্কেল</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>কার্বন স্কেল</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>নাইট্রোজেন স্কেল</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>হাইড্রোজেন স্কেল</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-১১১]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 132</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>Cl এর নিউক্লিয়ন সংখ্যা কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>18</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>17</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>35</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>36</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: নিউক্লিয়ন সংখ্যা = প্রোটন সংখ্যা + নিউট্রন সংখ্যা।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-১১০]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-923" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-88">\rm mol\ L^{-1} </script></span> হয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-93-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21CC;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-964" style="width: 13.773em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.273em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1011.15em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-965"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-966" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-967" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-968"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.748em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.22em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-969"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-970" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-971"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-972" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-973" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-974" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.297em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-975" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-976" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-977" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇌</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-978" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-979" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-980"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-981" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-982"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.477em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-983" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-984"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-985"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-986" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-987" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-988" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-989" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-990" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-991" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-992" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-993"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-994" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-995" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-996" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo class="MJX-variant" stretchy="false">⇌</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>−</mo></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-93">\rm Mg\left(OH\right)^2\ \rightleftharpoons \left(Mg^{2+}\right)\times2[OH^-] </script></span><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-94-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#xD7;</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>&amp;#xD7;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#xD7;</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-997" style="width: 18.158em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.879em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1014.88em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-998"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-999" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1000" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1001" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1002" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1003" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1004"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1005"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1006" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1007" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1008" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1009" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">s</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1010" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1011" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1012" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1013" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1014"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1000.29em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1015" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1016" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1017" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1018" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1019"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1020" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1021" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1022" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1025" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1027"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1028"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1029" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1030" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-95-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1031" style="width: 5.002em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1032"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1033" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1034" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৬৬]</p>

                                            <p>কোবাল্ট ব্লু-গ্লাসে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-96-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1042" style="width: 1.753em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.418em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.343em, 1001.42em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1043"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1044"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.418em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.75em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1045" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.784em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1046" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.048em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-96">\rm K^+</script></span> আয়ন কোন বর্ণ দেয়?</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-97-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1047" style="width: 1.395em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1001.15em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1048"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1049"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1050" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1051" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo>+</mo></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-97">\rm K^+</script></span>&nbsp;খালি চোখে → হালকা বেগুনি শিখা।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৬০]</p>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 138</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোন দ্রবণ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-98-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1052" style="width: 2.684em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.2em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1002.2em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1053"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1054" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1055"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.492em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.49em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1056" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.486em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1057"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1058"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1059" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1060" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-98">\rm Ca^{2+}</script></span> আয়নের নিশ্চিতকরণ পরীক্ষায় ব্যবহৃত হয়?</p>

                                        </div>

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অ্যামোনিয়াম হাইড্রক্সাইড</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>পটাশিয়াম ফেরিসায়ানাইড</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১৯৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 139</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>রেকটিফাইড স্পিরিট উৎপাদন করা হয় কোন পদ্ধতিতে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আংশিক পাতন</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সমস্ফুটন পাতন</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>নিম্নচাপ&nbsp;পাতন</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ঊর্ধ্বপাতন</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: আংশিক পাতন পদ্ধতিতে ডিজেল, কেরোসিন পৃথকীকরণ, রেকটিফাইড স্পিরিট উৎপাদন, লঘু তৈল থেকে বেনজিন, টলুইন পৃথকীকরণ করা হয়।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-২০৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

vertical-align: -0.219em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-105">\rm Cl_2 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-106-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1101" style="width: 1.368em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.095em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.1em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1102"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1103"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.095em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.59em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1104" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.868em; left: 0.64em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1105" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.219em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.114em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-106">\rm F_2 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ব্রোমিন তরল, ক্লোরিন ও ফ্লোরিন গ্যাসীয় পদার্থ।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-২৭৬]</p>
</span>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-২৮৮]</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 143</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পারমাণবিক ব্যাসার্ধের ক্ষেত্রে নিচের কোন ক্রমটি সঠিক?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: লিথিয়ামের ব্যাসার্ধ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-116-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>152</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>.</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1221" style="width: 3.404em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.789em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1002.71em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1222"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1223" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">152</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1224" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1225" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1226" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1227" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>152</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>.</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-116">\rm 152\ pm.</script></span><br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-২৯৬]</p>

                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 144</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনটির অক্সাইড সানগ্লাস তৈরিতে ব্যবহৃত হয়?</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: Lanthanide Series এর মৌলসমূহ এর অক্সাইড UV ও IR রশ্মিকে দৃশ্যমান আলোর পরিসরে বিকিরণ করে।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-২৯২]</p>
</span>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 145</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>ধাতব ব্যাসার্ধ সাধারণত সমযোজী ব্যাসার্ধ অপেক্ষা কী পরিমাণ বেশি হয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-117-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1228" style="width: 4.328em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.554em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1003.51em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1229"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1230" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1231" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1232" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">10</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1233" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">%</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.164em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.114em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-117">\rm 5-10\% </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৩১৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-129-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mo>&amp;#x00A8;</mo></mover></mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1304" style="width: 3.199em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.625em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1002.58em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1305"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1306"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1307"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-1308"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1309" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.41em, 3.568em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0.125em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1310" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">¨</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1311"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1312" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1313" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1314" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৩২৭]</p>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-133-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1332" style="width: 2.143em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.733em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1001.73em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1333"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1334" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1335" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1336" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-133">\rm HCl </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: HF সর্বাধিক পোলার অণু।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৩৪০]</p>
</span>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 152</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পানিতে প্রতি <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-138-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1401" style="width: 2.424em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.977em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1001.9em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1402"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1403"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.71em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1404" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.747em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1405" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1406" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.225em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-138">\rm H_2O</script></span> এর সাথে গড়ে H-বন্ধনের সংখ্যা কত?</p>

                                        </div>

                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>3.4</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>6.7</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ২টি বা ৩টি H-বন্ধন থাকতে পারে, কিন্তু গড়ে 3.4 টি থাকে।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৩৫১]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.503em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1461"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1462"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1463" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1464" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-২৯৭]</p>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-154-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1515" style="width: 3.509em;                                             <p>নিচের কোন মৌলের ইলেকট্রন আসক্তির মান ধনাত্মক?</p>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: He এর ইলেকট্রন আসক্তি 0। He ব্যতীত সব নিষ্ক্রিয় গ্যাসের ইলেকট্রন আসক্তির মান ধনাত্বক।<br>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: সেমিকন্ডাক্টর বা অপধাতু ৬টি: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-165-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1604" style="width: 9.674em;                                             </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-170-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1653" style="width: 1.368em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.095em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1001.05em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1654"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1655" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1656" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-170">\rm Fe </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-171-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1657" style="width: 1.368em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.095em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1001.05em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1658"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1659" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1660" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-171">\rm Pt </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৩৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 167</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>এসিডের তীব্রতার ক্ষেত্রে নিচের কোন ক্রমটি সঠিক?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৭৪]</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 168</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোনটি দিয়ে ক্ষারীয় বাফার দ্রবণ তৈরি করা য়ায়?</p>

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.868em; left: 0.776em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1856" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-203-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2031" style="width: 3.281em;
