                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: হেবার পদ্ধতিতে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-205-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2049" style="width: 1.969em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.6em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.6em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2050"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2051" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2052"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2053" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2054" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-205">\rm NH_3 </script></span> উৎপন্ন করা হয়; অসওয়াল্ড পদ্ধতিতে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-206-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2055" style="width: 2.707em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2056"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2057"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.707em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1002.22em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2058"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2059"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2060" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2061" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2062" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৪৩১]</p>

                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 178</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোনটির ক্ষেত্রে অসওয়াল্ডের সূত্র প্রযোজ্য?</p>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-210-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2089" style="width: 2.871em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.325em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1002.28em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2090"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2091" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2092" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2093" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-210">\rm KOH </script></span></p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: মৃদু ক্ষার ও মৃদু অম্লের জন্য অসওয়াল্ডের সূত্র প্রযোজ্য।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৪৬৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                            </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-217-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2144" style="width: 3.827em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: উদ্ভিদের ফুল ফল ধারণে সহায়ক: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-219-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2158" style="width: 5.453em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ভিনেগার আচার, চাটনি, সস্ সংরক্ষণে ব্যবহৃত হয়।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৫৬৫]</p>

                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 184</span></div>

                                            <p>মাংস সংরক্ষণে কোন লবণ ব্যবহৃত হয়?</p>

                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-224-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>5</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2195" style="width: 4.146em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: মাংস সংরক্ষণে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-228-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2236" style="width: 1.969em; [হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৫৬৫]</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 185</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোনটি অক্সিজেন শোষণকারী অ্যান্টি অক্সিডেন্ট?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-231-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2254" style="width: 1.232em;                                         <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: ঈস্ট থেকে নিঃসৃত এনজাইম ইনভারটেস ও জাইমেস।<br>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: খাদ্যদ্রব্য সংরক্ষণে নিষিদ্ধ: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-241-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2332" style="width: 2.379em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.93em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2333"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2334" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2335" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2336"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2337" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2338" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-241">\rm CaC_2 </script></span> ও ফরমালিন।&nbsp;<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৫৬০]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-246-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2361" style="width: 1.15em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2362"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2363"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2364" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2365" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-246">\rm B_2</script></span>- ডারমাটিটিস, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-247-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mn>6</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2366" style="width: 1.15em;                                         <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: সল : পেইন্ট, milk of magnesia<br>
ফোম : সাবানের ফেনা, পাকানো ক্রিম (whipped cream)<br>
জেল : &nbsp;জেলি, পনির, দই<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৫৮৭]</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: টেলকম পাউডারের মূল উপাদান হলো টেলক্ (হাইড্রেটেড ম্যাগনেসিয়াম সিলিকেট)।<br>
[হাজারী স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২; পৃষ্ঠা-৫৯৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
